website_summaries.verdict: People were generally happy with the Under Armour Micro G Pursuit. They welcomed its appealing silhouette, its multiple width options, its flexible underfoot platform, and the comfortable midsole. It’s perceived as an agreeable neutral shoe for the roads. Contrariwise, the durability of the upper was considered questionable, and the color schemes were deliberated as misleading.
pros: Many consumers loved the fact that there was a wide-width option
The mesh material on the upper was appreciated because it conformed nicely to the shape and movement capacity of the foot
Several testers appreciated the flexibility of the underfoot platform
The cushioning system gave adequate support and shock dispersion, some runners noted
Most of the people who have tried the Under Armour Micro G Pursuit were happy with its design and color schemes
The weight of this running shoe was deemed sufficiently light for all-day wear
cons: The fabric near the toe area ripped apart after only a few uses, a purchaser complained
A few runners observed that the colorways of the actual product didn’t match the photos on the website

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's Micro G Pursuit Flexible and Comfortable Sport and Gym Shoes, White White White White 112 112, 8 UK 42.5 EU
product_meta.description:
Under Armour Micro G Pursuit Running Shoes - Test your endurance in these innovative, sleek men's trainers

These men's running shoes offer an optimum combination of flexibility and cushioning. The shoes are particularly suitable for high speeds, providing protection, comfort and agility. The Micro G foam midsole provides smooth landings and explosive starts, while cushioning the ball and heel of the foot. The running shoe is complemented by the tyre-like midsole pattern, which provides ultimate flexibility and first-class traction. The lightweight upper material makes the shoe particularly breathable. The height difference between the toe and heel area is 8 mm. The shoe is made from a combination of EVA, synthetic fabric and textile.

Under Armour Makes Athletes Better

Under Armour started with a T-shirt that gave athletes an undeniable advantage and ultimately resulted in a complete renewal of sportswear. Innovation is their lifeblood and the key to achieve brand mission.

Product Details:

 * Essential men's running shoes
 * Micro G foam insole
 * Flexible and comfortable
 * Fast-drying outer material
 * Material: Synthetic/textile/EVA
 * Fit: Men's
feature_bullets: NEUTRAL: For runners who need a balance of flexibility & cushioning
Lightweight mesh upper delivers complete breathability
Foam padding placed around your ankle collar & under the tongue for an incredibly comfortable fit & feel
High rebound, die-cut EVA sockliner built with extended arch support
One-piece Micro G foam midsole turns cushioned landings into explosive takeoffs
Tyre-inspired outsole pattern provides ultimate flex & superior traction
